data.persona: I am only the blacksmith's assistant, but everyone has pressured me to go on this wolf hunt. This has me very worried - people say I'm strong but I've never killed anything before. I don't know that I won't run away when the wolves charge us.
data.description:
You are in the Bazaar.
This place is made from oak wood. It is very small due to the wood aisles. The front of the store has a big wooden table as well as a scale.
There's an a scale, a big wooden table, an aisle, a A porcelain vase, a Arrow, a gold bar, and an oak wood here.
The villager and the a rat are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a knife and a tunic.

data.short_motivation: I need arrows and a bow for the hunt
data.mid_motivation: I need to prove my worth as a hunter, and would prefer a ranged weapon
data.long_motivation: I might get fired if I do not do well on this hunt and need to impress the blacksmith
